fields.name: corpus
fields.title: Corpus
fields.description: Name of a group of pieces

fields.name: piece
fields.title: Piece identifier
fields.description: Name identifier (filename without suffixes) of a piece

fields.name: i
fields.title: Index
fields.description: An integer serving as row ID

fields.name: mc
fields.title: Measure Count
fields.description: Running count of encoded <Measure> tags which do not necessarily express a full measure (e.g. in case of an anacrusis).

fields.name: mn
fields.title: Measure Number
fields.description: Measure number as printed in the score, computed from mc, dont_count and numbering_offset.

fields.name: quarterbeats
fields.title: Offset from Beginning
fields.description: Distance of an event from the piece's beginning. By default, only second endings are taken into account to reflect the proportions of a simply playthrough without repeats.

fields.name: duration_qb
fields.title: Duration in ♩
fields.description: A float corresponding to duration * 4

fields.name: keysig
fields.title: Key Signature
fields.description: Positive integer for number of sharps, negative integer for number of flats.

fields.name: timesig
fields.title: Time Signature
fields.description: Given as string, e.g. "4/4".

fields.name: act_dur
fields.title: Actual Length
fields.description: How long a measure actually lasts, which can deviate from the time signature. Relevant, for example, for pickup measures, split measures, cadenzas.

fields.name: mc_offset
fields.title: Offset of Encoded Measure
fields.description: Distance of a <Measure> from the beginning of the logical measure, expressed as fraction of a whole note. Relevant only for split and anacrusis measures, 0 otherwise.

fields.name: numbering_offset
fields.title: Numbering Offset
fields.description: An integer to be added to the measure number count, as specified in MuseScore.

fields.name: dont_count
fields.title: Exclude from measure count
fields.description: Is 1 if this MC does not increase the measure number counter, according to the MuseScore setting.

fields.name: barline
fields.title: Barline
fields.description: Name of non-default barline.

fields.name: breaks
fields.title: Breaks
fields.description: Can be "section" or "line".

fields.name: repeats
fields.title: Repeats
fields.description: Can be "start", "end", "firstMeasure", "lastMeasure"

fields.name: next
fields.title: Next Measure Counts
fields.description: The "mc" values of all <Measure> tags that can follow this one, specified as a tuple of integers.

fields.name: quarterbeats_all_endings
fields.title: Offset from Beginning (Including Endings)
fields.description: Distance from the piece's beginning, taking all endings into account for addressability purposes.

fields.name: volta
fields.title: Volta
fields.description: Number of an ending bracket, given as integer.

fields.name: corpus
fields.title: Corpus
fields.description: Name of a group of pieces

fields.name: piece
fields.title: Piece identifier
fields.description: Name identifier (filename without suffixes) of a piece

fields.name: i
fields.title: Index
fields.description: An integer serving as row ID

fields.name: mc
fields.title: Measure Count
fields.description: Running count of encoded <Measure> tags which do not necessarily express a full measure (e.g. in case of an anacrusis).

fields.name: mn
fields.title: Measure Number
fields.description: Measure number as printed in the score, computed from mc, dont_count and numbering_offset.

fields.name: quarterbeats
fields.title: Offset from Beginning
fields.description: Distance of an event from the piece's beginning. By default, only second endings are taken into account to reflect the proportions of a simply playthrough without repeats.

fields.name: quarterbeats_all_endings
fields.title: Offset from Beginning (Including Endings)
fields.description: Distance from the piece's beginning, taking all endings into account for addressability purposes.

fields.name: duration_qb
fields.title: Duration in ♩
fields.description: A float corresponding to duration * 4

fields.name: mc_onset
fields.title: Offset within Encoded Measure
fields.description: Distance of an event from the beginning of the <Measure> tag.

fields.name: mn_onset
fields.title: Offset within Logical Measure
fields.description: Distance from the beginning of the logical measure. Relevant, for example, to compute the metric position of an event.

fields.name: timesig
fields.title: Time Signature
fields.description: Given as string, e.g. "4/4".

fields.name: staff
fields.title: Staff
fields.description: Number of the staff where an event occurs, 1 designating the top staff.

fields.name: voice
fields.title: Notational Layer
fields.description: A number between 1-4 where 1 is MuseScore's default layer (blue), 2 the second layer in green with downward stems, etc.

fields.name: duration
fields.title: Duration
fields.description: As fraction of a whole note.

fields.name: gracenote
fields.title: Grace Note
fields.description: Name given to a type of grace note in the MuseScore encoding, e.g. "grace16"

fields.name: nominal_duration
fields.title: Nominal Duration
fields.description: The duration corresponding to a note/rest value without applying any dots or n-tuplets, as fraction of a whole note. Multiplied with "scalar" to yield the actual duration of the note/rest.

fields.name: scalar
fields.title: Scalar
fields.description: Decimal value reflecting all dots and n-tuplets modifying the duration of a note/rest. Yields the actual duration when multiplied with "nominal_duration".

fields.name: tied
fields.title: Tied Note
fields.description: 1 if a note is tied to the following one, -1 if it is being tied to by the previous one, 0 if both.

fields.name: tpc
fields.title: Tonal Pitch Class
fields.description: Specified on the line of fifths such that 0 = C, 1 = G, -1 = F, etc.

fields.name: midi
fields.title: MIDI pitch
fields.description: Value between 0 and 127 where 60 = C4, 61 = C#4/Db4, etc.

fields.name: octave
fields.title: Octave
fields.description: Octave number where 4 is the middle octave (' in Helmholtz notation).

fields.name: chord_id
fields.title: Chord ID
fields.description: Row in the chords table.

fields.name: volta
fields.title: Volta
fields.description: Number of an ending bracket, given as integer.

fields.name: corpus
fields.title: Corpus
fields.description: Name of a group of pieces

fields.name: piece
fields.title: Piece identifier
fields.description: Name identifier (filename without suffixes) of a piece

fields.name: i
fields.title: Index
fields.description: An integer serving as row ID

fields.name: mc
fields.title: Measure Count
fields.description: Running count of encoded <Measure> tags which do not necessarily express a full measure (e.g. in case of an anacrusis).

fields.name: mn
fields.title: Measure Number
fields.description: Measure number as printed in the score, computed from mc, dont_count and numbering_offset.

fields.name: quarterbeats
fields.title: Offset from Beginning
fields.description: Distance of an event from the piece's beginning. By default, only second endings are taken into account to reflect the proportions of a simply playthrough without repeats.

fields.name: quarterbeats_all_endings
fields.title: Offset from Beginning (Including Endings)
fields.description: Distance from the piece's beginning, taking all endings into account for addressability purposes.

fields.name: duration_qb
fields.title: Duration in ♩
fields.description: A float corresponding to duration * 4

fields.name: mc_onset
fields.title: Offset within Encoded Measure
fields.description: Distance of an event from the beginning of the <Measure> tag.

fields.name: mn_onset
fields.title: Offset within Logical Measure
fields.description: Distance from the beginning of the logical measure. Relevant, for example, to compute the metric position of an event.

fields.name: timesig
fields.title: Time Signature
fields.description: Given as string, e.g. "4/4".

fields.name: staff
fields.title: Staff
fields.description: Number of the staff where an event occurs, 1 designating the top staff.

fields.name: voice
fields.title: Notational Layer
fields.description: A number between 1-4 where 1 is MuseScore's default layer (blue), 2 the second layer in green with downward stems, etc.

fields.name: label
fields.title: Label
fields.description: String corresponding to the entire annotation label.

fields.name: globalkey
fields.title: Global Key
fields.description: The key of the entire piece as note name, lowercase designating a minor key.

fields.name: localkey
fields.title: Local Key
fields.description: The key that a Roman numeral is relative to, expressed as a Roman numeral relative to the global key.

fields.name: pedal
fields.title: Pedal Point
fields.description: Specified as Roman numeral.

fields.name: chord
fields.title: Chord
fields.description: The part of an annotation label that corresponds to the actual chord label.

fields.name: special
fields.title: Special Label
fields.description: Column where special labels such as "Fr6" or "Ger65" are stored which are converted internally to Roman numerals.

fields.name: numeral
fields.title: Roman Numeral
fields.description: The Roman numeral part of a DCML label, lowercase for all chords with a minor third.

fields.name: figbass
fields.title: Chord Inversion
fields.description: 7, 65, 43, 2, 64, 6 or empty for root position.

fields.name: changes
fields.title: Changes
fields.description: Alterations, suspensions, additions, and omissions, written within parentheses in the chord label.

fields.name: relativeroot
fields.title: Relative Root
fields.description: The Roman numeral following the / in applied chords. Can itself include a /. For example, V/V if the label pertains to the major scale on the second scale degree.

fields.name: cadence
fields.title: Cadence
fields.description: PAC, IAC, EC, DC, PC, HC, and HC subtypes such as HC.SIM

fields.name: phraseend
fields.title: Phrase Annotation
fields.description: The phrase annotation part of a DCML label, can be {, }, or }{. In an older version, the only label was \\

fields.name: globalkey_is_minor
fields.title: Global Key is Minor
fields.description: Boolean that is 1 if the piece is in minor and 0 if it is in major.

fields.name: localkey_is_minor
fields.title: Local Key is Minor
fields.description: Boolean that is 1 if the local key is minor and 0 if it is major.

fields.name: chord_tones
fields.title: Chord Tones
fields.description: Tones expressed by the label, as fifth intervals relative to the local tonic.

fields.name: added_tones
fields.title: Added Tones
fields.description: Chord tones considered as added, expressed as fifth intervals relative to the local tonic.

fields.name: root
fields.title: Root
fields.description: Pertaining to MuseScore encoding.

fields.name: bass_note
fields.title: Bass Note
fields.description: Loweste note designated by the chord label, expressed as fifth intervals relative to the local tonic.

fields.name: alt_label
fields.title: Alternative Label
fields.description: Another interpretation of the same chord which the annotator finds equally or slightly less convincing.

fields.name: volta
fields.title: Volta
fields.description: Number of an ending bracket, given as integer.

fields.name: corpus
fields.title: Corpus
fields.description: Name of a group of pieces

fields.name: piece
fields.title: Piece identifier
fields.description: Name identifier (filename without suffixes) of a piece

fields.name: i
fields.title: Index
fields.description: An integer serving as row ID

fields.name: mc
fields.title: Measure Count
fields.description: Running count of encoded <Measure> tags which do not necessarily express a full measure (e.g. in case of an anacrusis).

fields.name: mn
fields.title: Measure Number
fields.description: Measure number as printed in the score, computed from mc, dont_count and numbering_offset.

fields.name: quarterbeats
fields.title: Offset from Beginning
fields.description: Distance of an event from the piece's beginning. By default, only second endings are taken into account to reflect the proportions of a simply playthrough without repeats.

fields.name: quarterbeats_all_endings
fields.title: Offset from Beginning (Including Endings)
fields.description: Distance from the piece's beginning, taking all endings into account for addressability purposes.

fields.name: duration_qb
fields.title: Duration in ♩
fields.description: A float corresponding to duration * 4

fields.name: mc_onset
fields.title: Offset within Encoded Measure
fields.description: Distance of an event from the beginning of the <Measure> tag.

fields.name: mn_onset
fields.title: Offset within Logical Measure
fields.description: Distance from the beginning of the logical measure. Relevant, for example, to compute the metric position of an event.

fields.name: timesig
fields.title: Time Signature
fields.description: Given as string, e.g. "4/4".

fields.name: staff
fields.title: Staff
fields.description: Number of the staff where an event occurs, 1 designating the top staff.

fields.name: voice
fields.title: Notational Layer
fields.description: A number between 1-4 where 1 is MuseScore's default layer (blue), 2 the second layer in green with downward stems, etc.

fields.name: duration
fields.title: Duration
fields.description: As fraction of a whole note.

fields.name: gracenote
fields.title: Grace Note
fields.description: Name given to a type of grace note in the MuseScore encoding, e.g. "grace16"

fields.name: nominal_duration
fields.title: Nominal Duration
fields.description: The duration corresponding to a note/rest value without applying any dots or n-tuplets, as fraction of a whole note. Multiplied with "scalar" to yield the actual duration of the note/rest.

fields.name: scalar
fields.title: Scalar
fields.description: Decimal value reflecting all dots and n-tuplets modifying the duration of a note/rest. Yields the actual duration when multiplied with "nominal_duration".

fields.name: chord_id
fields.title: Chord ID
fields.description: Row in the chords table.

fields.name: slur
fields.title: Slur
fields.description: IDs of active slurs that a chord falls under, as a tuple of integers.

fields.name: volta
fields.title: Volta
fields.description: Number of an ending bracket, given as integer.

fields.name: corpus
fields.title: Corpus
fields.description: Name of a group of pieces

fields.name: piece
fields.title: Piece identifier
fields.description: Name identifier (filename without suffixes) of a piece

fields.name: TimeSig
fields.title: Time Signatures
fields.description: All time signatures in a piece and where they occur. Format: '<MC>: <timesig>, <MC>: <timesig>, ...' Corresponds to a dictionary without outer curly braces.

fields.name: KeySig
fields.title: Key Signatures
fields.description: All key signatures in a piece and where they occur. Format: '<MC>: <keysig>, <MC>: <keysig>, ...'Corresponds to a dictionary without outer curly braces.

fields.name: last_mc
fields.title: Highest Measure Count
fields.description: The highest Measure Count value in the piece. Corresponds to the number of <Measure> tags.

fields.name: last_mn
fields.title: Highest Measure Number
fields.description: The highest Measure Number in the piece. Corresponds roughly to the number of complete bars.

fields.name: length_qb
fields.title: Quarter Length
fields.description: The length of a piece in quarter notes.

fields.name: last_mc_unfolded
fields.title: Highest Measure Count (unfolded)
fields.description: The amount of <Measure> tags of a full playthrough, i.e. when all repeats are unfolded. Equals 'last_mc' if piece has no repeat signs.

fields.name: last_mn_unfolded
fields.title: Highest Measure Number (unfolded)
fields.description: The last Measure Number when all repeats are unfolded. Equals 'last_mn' if piece has no repeat signs.

fields.name: length_qb_unfolded
fields.title: Quarter Length (unfolded)
fields.description: The length of full playthrough in quarter notes, i.e. when all repeats are unfolded. Equals 'length_qb' if piece has no repeat signs.

fields.name: volta_mcs
fields.title: Volta Measure Counts
fields.description: For each group of alternative endings, a nested list where each inner list contains the "mc" values of the <Measure> tags grouped into one ending.

fields.name: all_notes_qb
fields.title: Summed Note Duration
fields.description: The summed duration of all notes in a given piece, measured in ♩.

fields.name: n_onsets
fields.title: Number of Note Onsets
fields.description: Number of onsets in a piece. Different from the number of entries in the 'notes' table, because that one corresponds to the number of note heads; but notes being tied to do not represent onsets.

fields.name: n_onset_positions
fields.title: Number of Unique Onset Positions (slices)
fields.description: Number of unique onset positions in a piece. Corresponds to the number of slices when performing full expansion.

fields.name: guitar_chord_count
fields.title: Number of Guitar/Jazz Chord Labels
fields.description: Number of guitar/jazz/absolute chord labels in a piece.

fields.name: form_label_count
fields.title: Number of Form Annotation Labels
fields.description: Number of form annotation labels in a piece.

fields.name: label_count
fields.title: Number of DCML Labels
fields.description: Number of chord annotation labels that match the regex of the DCML annotation standard.

fields.name: composed_start
fields.title: Earliest Composition Year
fields.description: Earliest possible year of composition.

fields.name: composed_end
fields.title: Latest Composition Year
fields.description: Latest possible year of composition.

fields.name: movementNumber
fields.title: Movement Number
fields.description: Metadata field for the number of a movement. Should be specified as integer, not as a Roman number.

creator.name: ms3
creator.description: A parser for MuseScore 3 files and data factory for annotated music corpora.
